listData.name: CHL Select Term Loan
listData.description: This easy to use, simple home loan with redraw has everything a property investor needs and nothing they don’t. Whether you’re new to investing or a seasoned purchaser, this loan delivers on all counts.

features.additionalInfo: Online redraw available
No Monthly Fee
Unlimited additional repayments if variable, up to $20,000 when fixed
Variable or Fixed Rate
100% Offset Account available on Fixed and Variable rate loans

fees.name: Company Search Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Payable each time a company search is required

fees.name: Arrears Administration Fee
fees.additionalInfo: This fee is debited to your Home Loan Account when you are in arrears. This fee is debited to your Home Loan Account every 28 days thereafter for so long as you remain in arrears.

fees.name: Online Redraw
fees.additionalInfo: Payable when you redraw all or part of any repayments made on your loan (minimum $1). Per internet banking withdrawal - free

fees.name: Subsequent valuation fee
fees.additionalInfo: Payable for a valuation performed as the result of your request for us to deal with a security after settlement.

fees.name: Overdrawn Approval
fees.additionalInfo: For all transactions initiated by you or an account operator that we approve and that overdraws your account (charged per day, not per transaction). This fee will not be charged where the bank is notified that all party(ies) to the loan are deceased

fees.name: Direct Debit Dishonour Fee
fees.additionalInfo: When there are insufficient funds in your account to cover a direct debit, this fee is charged

fees.name: Fixed Rate Break Costs
fees.additionalInfo: Break costs may be payable in certain circumstances during a fixed rate term, such as: converting to another annual percentage rate; or Prepaying part (currently more than $20,000 p.a) or all of the outstanding loan

fees.name: Additional Processing Fee Per Split Loan
Valuation Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Total cost of valuations to be calculated with Bank covering up to $300. If total amount is under $300, the customer will not be required to pay. Any amount over $300 will be paid by the customer.

fees.name: Manual Redraw Fee
fees.additionalInfo: This fee is charged when you redraw all or part of any repayments made on your loan. (not charged for redraws performed through online banking services)

fees.name: Repayment Recalculation Fee
fees.additionalInfo: This fee is charged each time you request that we agree to a decrease in your repayments

fees.name: Loan Variation Fee - Simple
fees.additionalInfo: This fee is charged if you apply for us to: Vary your existing contract, Convert to another annual percentage rate, Agree to a request to a consent or change of borrower details, Release or substitute a security (a discharge administration fee may also be payable)

fees.name: Loan Variation Fee - Complex
fees.additionalInfo: This fee is charged if you apply for us to • Change your product • Remove a guarantor • Increase your loan • Agree to a sub division

fees.name: Loan Variation Fee
fees.additionalInfo: This fee is charged if you apply to us to vary existing contract before settlement occurs.

fees.name: Legal Fees for Establishing the Loan
fees.additionalInfo: Payable for services including the preparation of the security documents and/or attending to settlement on our behalf and/or conducting all title search enquiries . Necessary to effect settlement. This fee is payable on the settlement date.

detailData.name: CHL Select Term Loan
detailData.description: This easy to use, simple home loan with redraw has everything a property investor needs and nothing they don’t. Whether you’re new to investing or a seasoned purchaser, this loan delivers on all counts.

listData.name: Adelaide Bank SmartFit
listData.description: Fully featured with a competitive variable rate, this loan comes with the benefits of a 100% offset account.

features.additionalInfo: Online redraw available
100% Offset for both variable and fixed rate loans
Unlimited additional repayments if variable, up to $20,000 when fixed

fees.name: Direct Debit Dishonour Fee
fees.additionalInfo: When there are insufficient funds in your account to cover a direct debit, this fee is charged

fees.name: Arrears Administration Fee
fees.additionalInfo: This fee is debited to your Home Loan Account when you are in arrears. This fee is debited to your Home Loan Account every 28 days thereafter for so long as you remain in arrears.

fees.name: Inward Telegraphic Transfer fees (Domestic)
fees.additionalInfo: Payable when we accept a payment from an Australian financial institution for transfer to your account

fees.name: Inward Telegraphic Transfer fees (International)
fees.additionalInfo: Payable when we accept a payment from a foreign currency for transfer to your account

fees.name: Online Redraw
fees.additionalInfo: Payable when you redraw all or part of any repayments made on your loan (minimum $1). Per internet banking withdrawal - free

fees.name: Valuation Fee
fees.additionalInfo: This fee amount varies. The Bank will cover up to $300 of valuation costs to originate the home loan. Where these costs exceed $300 you must pay this excess amount.

fees.name: Search Processing Fee
fees.additionalInfo: This fee is charged for the bank to perform a title search or other searches as required when you request to vary your contract

fees.name: Loan Variation Fee
fees.additionalInfo: This fee is charged if you apply to us to vary an existing contract before settlement occurs

fees.name: Company Search Fee
fees.additionalInfo: This fee is charged for the bank to perform a company search as required

detailData.name: Adelaide Bank SmartFit
detailData.description: Fully featured with a competitive variable rate, this loan comes with the benefits of a 100% offset account.

listData.name: Aussie Elevate Loan
listData.description: If you’re after a loan that’s packed with features, it’s hard to look past Aussie Elevate.

features.additionalInfo: Online redraw available
Unlimited additional repayments if variable, up to $20,000 when fixed
Variable or Fixed Rate
100% Offset Account available on Fixed and Variable rate loans

fees.name: Subsequent valuation fee
fees.additionalInfo: Payable for a valuation performed as the result of your request for us to deal with a security after settlement.

fees.name: Online Redraw
fees.additionalInfo: Payable when you redraw all or part of any repayments made on your loan (minimum $1). Per internet banking withdrawal - free

fees.name: Overdrawn Approval
fees.additionalInfo: For all transactions initiated by you or an account operator that we approve and that overdraws your account (charged per day, not per transaction). This fee will not be charged where the bank is notified that all party(ies) to the loan are deceased

fees.name: Direct Debit Dishonour Fee
fees.additionalInfo: When there are insufficient funds in your account to cover a direct debit, this fee is charged

fees.name: Fixed Rate Break Costs
fees.additionalInfo: Break costs may be payable in certain circumstances during a fixed rate term, such as: converting to another annual percentage rate; or Prepaying part (currently more than $20,000 p.a) or all of the outstanding loan

fees.name: Additional Processing Fee Per Split Loan
fees.additionalInfo: Payable for additional processing required for each split loan

fees.name: Valuation Fee
fees.additionalInfo: We will cover up to $300 of valuation costs to originate the home loan. Where these costs exceed $300 you must pay this excess amount.

fees.name: Manual Redraw Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Payable when you redraw all or part of the residual amount of the loan balance and loan limit.

fees.name: Repayment Recalculation Fee
fees.additionalInfo: If you pay extra funds into your home loan, you may be able to recalculate your repayments in order to reduce what you need to pay each month. This would effectively clear any ahead amount on your loan. (The extra funds paid into the loan prior to the recalculation would not be available for redraw.)

fees.name: Loan Variation Fee - Simple
fees.additionalInfo: Payable when we agree to: – vary your existing contract or; – a request to a consent or change of borrower details or; – convert to another annual percentage rate or; – convert your home loan from one product to another or; – release or substitute a security (Discharge administration fee may also be applicable)

fees.name: Loan Variation Fee - Complex
fees.additionalInfo: Payable when we agree to: – a removal of guarantors or; – increase your amount of credit or; – a transfer subject to mortgage or subsequent mortgage or; – a sub division

fees.name: Discharge Administration Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Payable for each security attached to a home loan that we partially or fully discharge at your request. Note: A Loan Variation fee may be charged

fees.name: Offset Admin Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Monthly administration fee. Payable each month for each loan with an offset (per account)

fees.name: Company Search Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Payable each time a company search is required

fees.name: Arrears administration fee
fees.additionalInfo: This fee is debited to your home loan account when you’re in arrears and debited every 28 days for as long as you remain in arrears. The fee is payable with the next minimum repayment.

fees.name: Legal Fees for Establishing Loan
fees.additionalInfo: Payable for services including the preparation of the security documents and/or attending to settlement on our behalf and/or conducting all title search enquiries necessary to effect settlement. The fee is payable on the settlement date.

fees.name: Loan Variation Fee
fees.additionalInfo: This fee is charged if you apply to us to vary existing contract before settlement

detailData.name: Aussie Elevate Loan
detailData.description: If you’re after a loan that’s packed with features, it’s hard to look past Aussie Elevate.

fees.name: Legal fees for establishing the loan

fees.name: Online Redraw
fees.additionalInfo: Payable when you redraw all or part of any repayments made on your loan (minimum $1). Per internet banking withdrawal - free

fees.name: Fixed Rate Break Costs

fees.name: Additional Processing Fee Per Split Loan
Valuation Fee

fees.name: Manual Redraw Fee
fees.additionalInfo: This fee is charged when you redraw all or part of any repayments made on your loan. (not charged for redraws performed through online banking services)

fees.name: Repayment Recalculation Fee

fees.name: Loan Variation Fee - Simple
fees.additionalInfo: This fee is charged if you apply for us to: Vary your existing contract, Convert to another annual percentage rate, Agree to a request to a consent or change of borrower details, Release or substitute a security (a discharge administration fee may also be payable)

fees.name: Loan Variation Fee - Complex
fees.additionalInfo: This fee is charged if you apply for us to • Change your product • Remove a guarantor • Increase your loan • Agree to a sub division

fees.name: Consent to lease fee
fees.additionalInfo: For Business Line accounts, payable for us to peruse and approve a tenancy agreement where we hold a mortgage over the security.

fees.name: Arrears Administration Fee
fees.additionalInfo: This fee is debited to your home loan account when you are in arrears. This fee is debited to your home loan account every 28 days thereafter for so long as you remain in arrears. The fee is payable with the next minimum repayment.

fees.name: Additional Title Search Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Payable per search for any searches of registers or documents that we consider necessary in connection with this contract and/or a security. Types of searches may include, but are not limited to, company, business name, incorporated association and bankruptcy  searches.

listData.name: Adelaide Cash Management Account
listData.description:
An interest earning at-call deposit account which is sold to new or existing customers via a custodian or advisor. 

Account access is available via online banking, direct debit or cheque facility

fees.name: EFTPOS purchase
fees.additionalInfo: Charged for each purchase you make via EFTPOS

fees.name: EFTPOS withdrawal
fees.additionalInfo: Charged for each withdrawal you make via EFTPOS

fees.name: Bank@Post withdrawal
fees.additionalInfo: Charged for each withdrawal you make via Bank@Post

fees.name: Bank@Post deposit
fees.additionalInfo: Charged for each deposit you make via Bank@Post

fees.name: Branch withdrawal
fees.additionalInfo: Charged for each branch withdrawal

fees.name: Branch transfer
fees.additionalInfo: Charged for each branch transfer

fees.name: Bank cheque withdrawal
fees.additionalInfo: Charged for each bank cheque that you request

fees.name: Stop payment of Bank cheque
fees.additionalInfo: Charged to your account when you request that a stop payment be placed on a Bank cheque, which prevents anyone from cashing the cheque (only available in limited circumstances)

fees.name: Swift
fees.additionalInfo: Charged to your account when you request a same-day transfer of funds to be made electronically to a non Adelaide Bank account

fees.name: Telegraphic transfer
fees.additionalInfo: Charged when you request us to electronically transfer foreign or Australian currency overseas

fees.name: Inward telegraphic transfer (domestic)
fees.additionalInfo: Acceptance of payment of an Australian financial institution for fast transfer to any Adelaide Bank account

fees.name: Inward telegraphic transfer (international)
fees.additionalInfo: Acceptance of payments in foreign currency for transfer to any Adelaide Bank account

fees.name: Coin counting fee
fees.additionalInfo: $1 per bag (minimum charge $5 for non customers). Payable if loose or incorrectly bagged coins are deposited to your account at a branch

fees.name: Interbank credit transfer
fees.additionalInfo: Charged when you request a branch transfer of funds to a non Adelaide Bank account

fees.name: Bank warrant
fees.additionalInfo: Charged when you request a sameday transfer of funds to be made to a non Adelaide Bank account

fees.name: Special service
fees.additionalInfo: $60 per hour (minimum charge $30). Charged when you require us to perform a special service on your behalf. For example, this may be charged for non-standard timeconsuming activities that you request us to undertake

fees.name: Interim statement fee
fees.additionalInfo: $5 per statement. Charged when you request an account statement to be produced before your next regularly scheduled statement

fees.name: Duplicate statement fee
fees.additionalInfo: $5 per statement. Charged when you request a copy of a statement that we have previously provided to you

fees.name: Closing details
fees.additionalInfo: $5 per request. Charged if you request a copy of details on a closed account

fees.name: Transaction summary
fees.additionalInfo: Charged when you request a summary of transactions performed on your account

fees.name: Direct Debit dishonour
fees.additionalInfo: Charged when there are insufficient funds in your account to cover an inward direct debit

fees.name: Cheque search fee
fees.additionalInfo: charged when you request us to provide

listData.name: Dreamstreet
listData.description:
Don't be misled; home loans are not just about the rate. Not all home loans are created equal and it all depends on your individual situation.

With all loans under the one roof and a wide selection of tailored solutions available to you, your Dreamstreet mortgage consultant will find the right fit for you and give you the power to do more of what you dream of. 

We value inclusivity. All applications are treated equally – we welcome first home buyers, home owners who are refinancing, investors of any age and stage, as well as people who are self-employed.
